news.title: Wealthy US businessman sues Irish equestrian centre over ownership of valuable horse
news.summary: A wealthy Greek-American entrepreneur is suing an Irish equestrian centre and its proprietor over the ownership of a valuable horse.

news.title: Huge disruption expected as taxi drivers announce six-day protest in Dublin for next week
news.summary: Major traffic disruption is expected in Dublin next week as taxi drivers have announced a six-day protest.

news.title: ‘You haven't sent a decent song in 25 years,’ former Israeli Eurovision delegation member tells Ireland as RTÉ pulls out of contest
news.summary: Ireland should “take a year off [from Eurovision]… return stronger, and hopefully be in the top five for a change”, according to a former member of the Israeli Eurovision delegation.

news.title: Tommy Meskill takes Six One News role while Sarah McInerney joins Morning Ireland in latest RTÉ shake-up
news.summary: Tommy Meskill is taking over from David McCullagh on Six One News while the shake-up at RTÉ Radio continues.

news.title: Late Late Toy Show theme revealed, as Liam Neeson to make an appearance
news.summary: The classic Christmas movie character  The Grinch  looks set to steal the spotlight on tonight’s  Late Late Toy Show .

news.title: Ray O’Donoghue: With just four thefts a day and every stabbing making the news, Dublin is hardly a crime-ridden Gotham City
news.summary: When I began work as Dublin city’s night-time adviser 18 months ago, the city was weighed down by a negative narrative. It wasn’t long after the November riots, a low point that left many wondering what had happened to our capital after dark.

news.title: ‘I am still the elected president’ – Sepp Blatter eviscerates Gianni Infantino over Ronaldo, Trump and Saudi Arabia
news.summary: Sepp Blatter can no longer bring himself to say Gianni Infantino's name. The Swiss administrator ran Fifa from 1998 to 2015 until he left amid corruption scandal.

news.title: Mary McCarthy: Am I the only person who didn’t hate Meghan Markle’s Netflix Christmas special?
news.summary: Meghan Markle has been slated for her festive special, but I enjoyed watching the Duchess of Sussex and her pals fiddle around making cheese puffs and Christmas wreaths.

news.title: How a stag on the loose for over a year in a built-up part of Clare continues to evade capture
news.summary: A stag that has been on the loose in a residential area of Ennis, Co Clare has raised concerns among locals after he evaded a series of capture attempts from gardaí and local wildlife services.

news.title: ‘The most sensible option is one most people overlook’ – money experts on the smartest ways to finance a new car
news.summary: Cars are one of the hot middle-age dinner party topics, along with recommendations for a carpet cleaner or a decent supermarket wine.
